text: The South Korea national under-20 football team represents South Korea in the under-20 international football. They have qualified for the FIFA U-20 World Cup and their best result is runners-up at the 2019 FIFA U-20 World Cup. They hosted the 2017 FIFA U-20 World Cup. They have won the AFC U-20 Asian Cup 12 times. ==Competitive record== Champions Runners-up Third place Tournament played on home soil ===FIFA U-20 World Cup=== FIFA U-20 World Cup record Year Round
